entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 50
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
